page.title: 19ECCLESFIELD RIDING SOCIETY
page.content: The Ecclesfield Riding Society(E.R.S.) is commonly called the pony club.It is held every Tuesday night in a field on Chapeltown Road.It starts at 6.30pm and finishes at about 8.00 pm.One week it is a tuition night and the next it is a fun night where you can jump or practice your riding at the bottom of the field.On tuition night there are three groups.In the summer it is the showing season.Sometimes on Sundays there are horse shows on the E.R.S. field.There are hand classes like the Young Stock,Mountain and Moorland, and The Bonny Pony.There are the jumping classes as well.Several children in our area own horses and ponies and stable them at local farms.
